title: Box, "Snuffbox"
provenance: Gift from the Thomas W. Evans Collection from University of Pennsylvania School of Dental Medicine
creditline: Gift from the Thomas W. Evans Collection from University of Pennsylvania School of Dental Medicine
description: A gold box with a personalized lid. The letter "N" in each of the lids corners in diamonds. The center of the lid is decorated with another larger letter "N" in diamonds with a diamond crown above the letter. Along the sides of the box there is an abstract design carved in gold.

tombstone.epitaph:
Box, "Snuffbox".
Gold, diamonds. Gift from the Thomas W. Evans Collection from University of Pennsylvania School of Dental Medicine. 1983-69-11.
